pkgmetadata.longdescription: MissFITS is a program that performs basic maintenance and packaging tasks on FITS files using an optimised FITS library. MissFITS can: * add/edit/remove FITS header keywords * split/join Multi-Extension-FITS (MEF) files * unpile/pile FITS data-cubes * create/check/update FITS checksums, using R. Seamanâ€™s protocol.
